summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Rihla Enterprise Cloud Platform MVP. Backend API testing achieved 92.9% success rate (13/14 tests passed). All frontend features tested successfully including authentication, multi-brand dashboard, order management, inventory control, customer management, analytics, and theme toggle. Fixed critical product creation bug (520 error).

fixed_bugs.issue: Product creation was returning 520 Internal Server Error due to AttributeError when accessing brand.id on dict object
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Fixed brand lookup logic in create_product endpoint to handle dict objects correctly

minor_issues.issue: Test credentials (test@rihla.com) don't exist in database
minor_issues.impact: Not a real bug - just test data issue. Registration works perfectly and subsequent logins work fine

passed_tests: Backend: Get Brands - 4 brands returned (200 OK)
Backend: Revenue Trend - 30 data points (200 OK)
Backend: Get Orders Filtered by Status (200 OK)
Frontend: Dashboard displays with all 4 KPI cards (Revenue, Orders, Customers, Products)
Frontend: Revenue Trend chart displays correctly
Frontend: Brand switcher works (tested with Rihla Abaya filter)
Frontend: Create Order modal and form submission works
Frontend: Add Product modal and form submission works
Frontend: Products table displays with stock levels and status badges
Frontend: Customers page displays customer cards with order count and LTV
Frontend: Analytics page displays all charts (Daily Revenue, Revenue by Brand, Monthly Revenue, Monthly Orders)
Frontend: Settings page displays user profile information
Frontend: Theme toggle works (Dark/Light mode switching)
Frontend: All navigation links work correctly
